page.title: 19WEATHER IN THE BACK DISTRICT
page.content: {LOCATION } Because Lewis is situated at the edge of the North Atlantic, any frontal systems and low pressure areas from the west tend to hit the island first. This happens frequently. {TYPES OF WEATHER} Lewis has an extreme western maritime climate.This means that the weather is generally wet with strong winds,often gale force.During the summer there are usually hot dry spells but these are not consistant.There is usually snow in winter but it doesn't last long thanks to the warmth in the Gulf Stream. {THE WEATHER'S EFFECT} Islanders worry about the weather.It is important that the weather is warm and dry as in spring lambs are being born and peat has to be cut,dried and taken home.
